Basic LOC01 plots from Jennie's python notebook, translated to R.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(patchwork)
library(maps)

theme_set(theme_classic())
loc01_data <- "data/LOC-01_Combined_Nav_TSG_Fluo_HydroFIA.txt"
```

```{r}
loc01_df <- read_csv(loc01_data,
                     na = c("", "NA", "NaN"),
                     col_types = "cnninnnnnncni",
                     ) |> 
  mutate(DateTime_UTC = as.POSIXct(DateTime_UTC, 
                                   format = "%d-%b-%Y %H:%M:%S", 
                                   tz = "UTC"),
         Salinity_PSU = ifelse(Salinity_PSU < 29, NA, Salinity_PSU))


dye_df <- loc01_df |> 
  filter(DateTime_UTC > as.POSIXct("2023-09-02 12:00:00", tz = "UTC"),
         DateTime_UTC < as.POSIXct("2023-09-04 01:30:00", tz = "UTC"))
```

# Timeseries

```{r}
dye_plot <- ggplot(dye_df, aes(DateTime_UTC, Dye_ppb)) +
  geom_line() +
  scale_y_log10() +
  labs(x = "Time",
       y = "Dye (ppb)")
temp_plot <- ggplot(dye_df, aes(DateTime_UTC, Temp1_C)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(x = "Time",
       y = "Temp (C)")
sal_plot <- ggplot(dye_df, aes(DateTime_UTC, Salinity_PSU)) +
  geom_line() +
  labs(x = "Time",
       y = "Salinity (PSU)")
ta_plot <- ggplot(dye_df, aes(DateTime_UTC, Corrected_TA_umol_kg_)) +
  geom_point(shape = 1) +
  labs(x = "Time",
       y = expression(paste(TA ~ (μmol ~ kg^-1))))

(dye_plot + temp_plot) / (sal_plot + ta_plot)
```

# Maps

```{r}
# Outline map
map_data = map_data("usa")

head(dye_df)

myscaler <- function(x, from, to) {
  high=1.2
  low=0.1
  ifelse(x<low,0,ifelse(x>high,1,(x-low)/(high-low)))
}


# Plot 
ggplot() + 
  geom_map(data = map_data, map = map_data,
           aes(long, lat, map_id = region),
           fill = "white", color = "black") +
  geom_point(data = dye_df, 
             aes(x = Longitude, y = Latitude, color = log10(Dye_ppb)),
             size = .4) +
  scale_color_viridis_c(option = "D",
                        name = "Dye (log ppb)",
                        #trans = scales::log10_trans(),
                        rescaler = myscaler) +
  xlim(-70.8, -70.6) +
  ylim(41.01, 41.15) +
  coord_quickmap() +
  ggtitle("Dye") +
  xlab("Longitude") +
  ylab("Latitude")
  
```
